resources.string: Detected %1$s charging piles with a count of %2$d. Please delete any excess charging piles to ensure proper machine relocation.

Detected a significant deviation in the charging pile positions between the automatic route mode (calibration page on the web) and the fixed route mode (navigation route page). Please ensure that the charging piles are marked in the same position in both modes to ensure proper machine relocation functionality.
Failed to send close door command
Failed to close the door, task finished. Please check the door control wiring
MQTT connection timed out, please check the robot\'s network.
Door control module offline; reconnection failed; task ended
The robot is not bound to an elevator. Staff should check the elevator control platform to confirm the binding relationship between the robot and the elevator.

Elevator dispatch cannot be completed due to the elevator control gateway being offline. Please follow these steps to troubleshoot:\nStep 1: Verify that the elevator control gateway is online and properly connected to the elevator control platform. \nStep 2: If step 1 is not the issue, please contact the elevator control platform solution provider for support.
Failed to get instance ID, please check if the robot is properly bound to the elevator on the elevator control platform.
IMU error, please contact technical personnel
Failed to parse elevator request response, please contact the staff for investigation.
Laser error, please contact technical personnel
Timeout navigating to the elevator entry point, failed to cancel elevator task
Timeout when navigating to the exit elevator point; task ended
Timeout when navigating to the exit elevator point; failed to cancel elevator task; task ended
Timeout when navigating to the elevator point; task ended
Timeout when navigating to the elevator point; failed to cancel elevator task; task ended

No suitable elevator was found for the robot. We recommend following these steps to troubleshoot: 
 Step 1: Staff should log in to the elevator control platform to ensure that the elevator control robot is bound to the elevator and that the elevator control gateway is bound to the elevator. 
 Step 2: Confirm that the elevator control platform's configuration of the minimum and maximum floor levels matches reality. 
 Step 3: If steps 1 and 2 do not resolve the issue, please contact the elevator control platform solution provider for support.

Detected that the charging pile is not calibrated in the automatic route mode (calibration page on the web). Please calibrate the charging pile in the automatic route mode at the same location as in the fixed route mode to ensure proper machine relocation functionality.
Failed to send open door command
Failed to open the door, task finished. Please check the door control module wiring
Failed to parse MQTT host, please contact the staff.
Elevator request failed, please check the robot\'s network.
Elevator request error, please contact the staff for investigation.
ROS System Exception, please contact technical support
Speedometer error, please contact technical personnel
Failed to subscribe to MQTT, please contact the staff to investigate.
Elevator control gateway offline, please contact technical support for troubleshooting.
Elevator request failed, please contact the staff for investigation.
Waiting for the elevator has timed out, please contact the staff for assistance
Air shower door waiting time cannot be less than 3 seconds
Air shower door dwell time setting
Alias length cannot be less than 5 characters, you can input Chinese, letters, numbers, -, and _
Already passed through door: %1$s, countdown will end before continuing the task.
Android network connected successfully. Connect to ROS WiFi?
Upgrade package not found, upgrade failed
App ID error, unable to check for updates
Failed to set the default floor:\n
Arrived at the back of %1$s door, closing the door...
Arrived at the front of %1$s door, opening the door...
Automatic charging level must be at least 10% lower than automatic working level
Elevator called successfully from inside, waiting for the elevator to reach the target floor
Elevator called successfully, waiting for the elevator to arrive
Key already exists, no need to save again
Calling module reconnection failed; please reconnect the module and restart the application
Unable to reach target, please check if the path setting is reasonable
Detected that the robot is charging, cannot dock the charging pile
Detected that the emergency stop button is pressed, cannot dock the charging pile
Task cannot be paused while lifting.
Task cannot be paused while docking with QR code.
Currently switching maps. Task cannot be paused.
Do not touch the screen while the robot is taking the elevator
Currently passing through a door-controlled area. Task cannot be paused.
Setting for the map where the charging pile is located
Detected that the lift module\'s last action was not completed. Please click the confirm button to reset the lift module.
Detected that the last elevation module action was not completed. Please click the confirmation button to complete the previous action.
Detected that the lift module is lifted. Please click the confirm button to reset the lift module.
Map switch detected, please check the machine\'s positioning and reload the points
Failed to generate exit path from the elevator, please retry after the countdown ends
The first and last lift points in the task have the same action; cannot set task end to restart route cruise or task loop
Previous lift action not completed; please complete the lift action first
Detected that the Android network is not connected, the elevator cannot be taken, task ended
Detected that Android is not connected to the specified outside network, the elevator cannot be taken, task ended
No alias input detected, clicking the [Confirm] button will use the robot ID as the alias.
Waiting time countdown switch is not open, cannot set the waiting time
Detected that the stop countdown switch is not turned on, cannot set the arrival tip play time
Only one lift point detected; cannot set task end to restart route cruise or task loop
Please click the lift down button first
Please click the lift up button first
Another robot is using the elevator, please retry after the countdown ends
Point %1$s is set to lift down, but the lift module is already in the down position; cannot start task
Point %1$s is set to lift up, but the lift module is already in the up position; cannot start task
Robot position abnormality detected, please check robot localization
Detected abnormal sensor state, %1$s, unable to use this application. Please contact technical support to fix the issue and restart the application.
Self-check failed, timeout without detecting ROS startup. Please check the robot\'s position before use.
Detected that the stop countdown is too short, cannot set the arrival tip play time
Detected abnormal wheel state, error code: %1$s, unable to use this application. Please contact technical support to fix the issue and restart the application.
Checking if entering the elevator is possible
After switching navigation modes, you need to reload waypoint information. Do you want to switch navigation modes?
Click the confirm button to lift down
Click the confirm button to lift up
Communication with navigation system failed. Please exit the application and check if the interface is properly connected
Please confirm if you want to delete all points?
Please confirm whether to delete the binding information of button %1$s?
Exiting this time will not save modifications. Do you want to exit route setting?
Please confirm if you want to cancel the download?
Please confirm whether to delete the point: %1$s?
Android network connection timed out. Would you like to try connecting to ROS WiFi first?
Waypoint countdown and manual lift control cannot be opened simultaneously. Do you want to enable waypoint countdown?
There are no points on the current map that can execute tasks
Current map is not available, please check:\n\t1. Whether the map name is set as the floor number;\n\t2. Whether the map has calibrated points;
Please do not select the current map
Door control module reconnection failed; please reconnect the module and restart the application
Door control serial port disconnected; reconnection failed
Failed to open the door control serial port, task ended. Please check if there is a connection to the door control label.
Download failed, file does not exist
Anti-fall triggered while passing through the door control area, task canceled
Elevator has arrived on this floor, enter the elevator
Elevator has arrived on floor %1$s, exit the elevator
Retry interval for failed path generation for elevator (unit: minutes)
Emergency stop button pressed, robot cannot move\nTo resume operation, rotate and release the emergency stop button
Emergency stop button pressed, task forcefully terminated
Number of detections for elevator entry and exit path generation
Switch for detecting elevator entry and exit path generation
You are inside the elevator, heading to floor %1$s
Failed to join multicast group, please check your network.
The following points are no longer on the map: %1$s. Please check the map or modify the route task
Failed to generate entry path to the elevator, please retry after the countdown ends
Failed to retrieve upgrade package information, unknown exception: %1$s
Failed to retrieve upgrade package information, error message: %1$s
Failed to find the number corresponding to the key: %1$s
Failed to switch the map, unable to retrieve the map name, task ended.
Failed to query route information. Please contact technical support. Error details: %1$s
Low battery, will go to the charging pile for charging in %1$d seconds
Do you want to clear all calling tasks?
Do you want to delete route: %1$s?
Querying the charging pile location, please wait…
Querying the product point location, please wait…
Insufficient permissions. Please grant the required permissions.
Lifting in progress. Please do not move or operate the robot.
Failed to respond when leaving the elevator
Lift module is already in the lowered position.
Lift module is already in the raised position.
Network data loading failed, local data is empty, please check the network connection and try again
Failed to load network data, and no valid AGV point data was found in the local data. Please check the network connection and try again.
The QR code point data is empty, please check if the points are set correctly and try again
Data loaded successfully, but no valid AGV point data was found. Please check if the point is bound to the QR code.
Data loaded successfully, map name is invalid, please set the map name as the corresponding floor number
Detected points in the map are not calibrated, please mark the points correctly before setting the default floor
Data loaded successfully, data is empty
Failed to load map data, and the local map data is empty. Please check the network connection and try again.
Manual lift control and waypoint countdown cannot be opened simultaneously. Do you want to enable manual lift control?
Map data loaded successfully, but the map is empty. Please check if a map is created in ROS.
Map loading failed, please check the network
Map loaded successfully, map name is invalid, please set the map name as the corresponding floor number
Close the door first, then navigate
The next point %1$s is set to lift down, so the current point cannot be set to lift down
The next point %1$s is set to lift up, so the current point cannot be set to lift up
Failed to dock with QR code. Task finished.
Charging station and product point not calibrated
No fixed routes detected in the current map. Please check the map.
Machine docking direction and leaving distance (unit: meters)
Lifting module is lowering, please wait...
Lifting module is lifting, please wait...
The arrival tip play time must be at least 10 seconds shorter than the stop time
Please turn on the elevator control mode switch first
Please choose the map where the charging pile is located
Please choose the map where the charging pile is located, otherwise the task cannot be executed.
Detected that you are in elevator control mode. Please set the floor where the charging pile is located before starting the task.
Detected that you are in elevator control mode and dual networks are enabled. Please select the internal and external networks first before starting the task.
Detected that you are in elevator control mode and dual networks are enabled. Please select the internal network first before starting the task.
Detected that you are in elevator control mode and dual networks are enabled. Please select the external network first before starting the task.
Please choose the map where the production point is located
Please choose the map where the production point is located, otherwise the task cannot be started.
Detected that you are in elevator control mode. Please set the floor where the production point is located before starting the task.
Please click the edit button above to add task points.
Please close lift control before setting point stay duration
Please confirm that the control module is in configuration mode before clicking the confirm button

Before starting pairing, please ensure that your mobile device and the robot are connected to the same network. Click the [Confirm] button, the robot will enter pairing mode.\nCurrent robot network: %1$s
Please enter the door control number.
Please enter a number within the range [%1$s, %2$s].
Please scan the QR code below for pairing
Please select a task point first
Detected that the current map has not been switched to the location of the charging point. Please switch the map to %1$s before starting relocation
Data loading failed, please check network connection
Map information retrieval failed, please check the network connection
Waypoint loading failed. Please check for calibrated waypoints.
The previous point %1$s is set to lift down, so the current point cannot be set to lift down
The previous point %1$s is set to lift up, so the current point cannot be set to lift up
Setting for the map where the production point is located
Failed to read point information file
Failed to read file name, please contact technical support
Retry to enter the elevator exceeded the maximum limit. Please contact technical support.
Received call, will go to %2$s in %1$d seconds.
Received a move task from the web, this task ended abnormally
Received delivery task, will start in %1$d seconds.
Received QR code task, will start in %1$d seconds.
Received route task, will start in %1$d seconds.
Please press down and then release the emergency stop switch to resume operation
Initializing calling mode data, please wait...
Initializing normal mode data, please wait…
Initializing QR Code mode data, please wait...
Initializing route mode data, please wait…
Relocation failed, task ended. Please push the robot back to the default floor\'s charging station location and relocate before continuing to use.
To ensure normal positioning, please dock the machine on the charging pile and then click relocate below
Application configuration has changed, will re-enter the application
Robot has entered pairing mode, please check if you have received information on your mobile device. Robot ID: %1$s, Alias: %2$s
Your robot type does not currently support QR code calibration mode.
Route mode currently does not support elevator use. Please turn off the elevator control switch before enabling route mode.
Failed to save the route. Please contact technical support, error details: %1$s
The robot is undergoing self-check, please wait before proceeding...
Failed to send close door command; please check the serial port and restart the application
Failed to send open door command; please check the serial port and restart the application
Failed to send set door number command; please check the serial port and restart the application
Set door number command sent successfully: %1$d
Skipping will use the robot ID as the default alias.
Starting location and target location cannot be the same point
Map switching failed, map not found: %1$s. Please ensure that Android and ROS are on the same network, then reload the map and waypoints.
Map switch successful, initializing map information.
Navigation abnormality canceled. Please contact technical support.
Interval for task cycle execution (unit: seconds)
Will execute route task %2$s again in %1$s
Interval for task cycle execution must be greater than 1 second
The corresponding point of the bound button has been bound
Support up to five audio files
Anti-fall triggered. Please press the emergency stop switch before continuing the task.
Please turn off the emergency stop switch before starting the task
Failed to initiate navigation, undefined error code: %1$d
Retry interval for calling the elevator (unit: minutes)
Please press the key corresponding to this number
The waiting time cannot be set to 0
Failed to connect to the network
WiFi password incorrect, please enter the correct password
After selecting a dual network, the robot will automatically switch to the inside network after entering the elevator. Do you confirm to select a dual network?
Robot will go to charging pile in %1$d seconds
Robot will go to production point in %1$d seconds
After selecting a single network, the robot will not automatically switch to the inside network after entering the elevator. Do you confirm to select a single network?
Changes will be lost after returning, are you sure you want to return?
Robot will start task in %1$d seconds
Automatic work battery level must be 10% higher than automatic charging level.
Working time and after-work time cannot be the same.
If it is detected that you do not have a binding location, please bind the location before entering the page
The robot you called has arrived
I am currently charging, please disconnect the power supply first
Connecting to the network, please wait…
Current interface cannot respond to online tasks, please try again later.
Elevator has arrived, enter the elevator
Elevator has arrived, exit the elevator
You are inside the elevator, heading to the target floor
Sorry for the delay. Please use the elevator first. Thank you!
You have left the elevator, this elevator trip is complete
Excuse me, could you please move aside? Our robot needs to pass through
Could you please make way? Our robot needs to pass through
Sorry, the robot needs to pass through. Please make some space. Thank you for your cooperation
Your materials have been delivered. Please pick them up promptly.
Target point not found. Please check if the point has been set
Okay, I will go to charge
Okay, I will go to the product point
Please select the starting position and the target position before starting the task
Please select the route points before starting the task
Next, we need to connect to the network
Please dock the robot with the charging pile first
Excuse me, please leave a little space. Thank you!
I\'m sorry, please move to the sides a bit. Thank you for your cooperation!
Please set the default floor before starting the task
Please select a point before starting the task
Please set the floor where the production point is located before starting the task.
Low battery, I will go to charge first
Current task finished, starting remote task
Charging connection failed, attempting to reconnect
My emergency stop switch has been pressed, I cannot move
Arrived at the charging location, starting to dock with the charging pile
Detected that you have not selected a target location. Please select a target location before starting the task
Received call task, will start immediately
Received call task, will start after countdown ends
Charging mode task received, will start immediately
Charging mode task received, will start after countdown ends
Received normal mode task, will start immediately
Received normal mode task, will start after countdown ends
Received QR code mode task, will start immediately
Received QR code mode task, will start after countdown ends
Return mode task received, will start immediately
Return mode task received, will start after countdown ends
Received route mode task, will start immediately
Received route mode task, will start after countdown ends
It\'s time to leave work. I\'m going to charge now.
It\'s work time. I\'m going to the production point.
Failed to initialize machine coordinates. Please check if the serial connection between Android and the navigation system is normal.
Failed to get navigation ID due to timeout. Please check if the serial connection between Android and the navigation system is normal.
Failed to get current map information due to timeout. Please check if the serial connection between Android and the navigation system is normal.
Failed to get robot type due to timeout. Please check if the serial connection between Android and the navigation system is normal.
Please enter a valid server address
Please add the server address first
Attempting to join room, please wait...
Successfully joined room. The machine will go online in the room after returning to the main screen; %1$s
Failed to join room. Please check:\n1. Whether the machine and server network are connected;\n2. Whether the room name and password are correct;
Before uploading map information to the server, please confirm:\n1. No machines are running in the room;\n2. Points and route calibration are correct;
Failed to upload map information. Please check the machine network
Uploading map information to server, please wait...
Creating task to go to %1$s, waiting for server response...
Task created successfully, waiting for server to dispatch orders
Clicking the confirm button will send the dispatch configuration. Please confirm:\n1. All machines are connected to the network: %1$s;\n2. Other machines have joined the multicast group;
Please connect to the network first
Successfully joined the multicast group, waiting to receive the configuration...
Clicking the confirm button will apply the following configuration:\nServer address: %1$s;\nRoom ID: %2$s;
Cannot switch navigation mode after dispatch mode is enabled
Dispatch mode is not compatible with elevator control mode
Dispatch mode is not compatible with door control mode
Dispatch mode is not compatible with elevator control, door control, and free path mode. Enabling it will disable these modes
Dispatch mode is enabled. Going online, please wait...
Successfully went online, starting to establish MQTT connection, please wait...
MQTT connection established successfully, subscribing to related topics, please wait...
Machine disconnected from the dispatch server
Attempting to go online again, please wait...
Network error, failed to go online
Failed to go online, please check if your room account and password are correct
Failed to go online, detected that you have not uploaded a map to the server, please upload the map and try again
Machine not bound to a room, please join a room and try again
Failed to go online, unknown error, code: %1$d, message: %2$s\nPlease contact technical support
Failed to go online, please contact technical support
Failed to establish MQTT connection, please contact technical support
Failed to subscribe to MQTT topic, please contact technical support
Detected room map update, attempting to go online again
Failed to go online, detected that the current map is not on the dispatch server
Detected map change, please ensure the map and positioning are correct and go online again
Detected network disconnection, disconnected from dispatch server, please check your network
Detected disconnection from dispatch server, unable to start task
Disconnected from dispatch server, reconnecting, please wait...
Failed to create task, please check machine network
Machine offline, failed to create task
Machine deviated from route, failed to create task. Please ensure the machine is within 1 meter of the route before starting the task
Failed to create task, unable to create route. Please check if the route is connected
Failed to create task, no free charging station found
Failed to create task, unknown error, code: %1$d, message: %2$s\nPlease contact technical support
Failed to create task, unknown exception: %1$s\nPlease contact technical support
Detected room map update, task finished
Task ended due to disconnection from dispatch server
Map upload failed, exception reason: %1$s\nPlease contact technical support
Map upload failed, please join the room first before uploading the map
Map upload failed, map information is empty
Map upload failed, missing charging station and production point
Map upload failed, missing charging station
Map upload failed, missing production point
Map upload failed, the following routes are not connected:\n%1$s
Map upload failed, undefined exception: code: %1$d, message: %2$s\nPlease contact technical support
Failed to join the room, please check the machine network
Failed to join the room, unknown exception: %1$s\nPlease contact technical support
Failed to join the room, please check the room and password
Failed to join the room, the machine is already bound to another room, please contact technical support
Failed to join the room, undefined exception: code: %1$d, message: %2$s\nPlease contact technical support
Failed to retrieve room configuration, please check the network
Failed to retrieve room configuration, exception reason: %1$s\nPlease contact technical support
Failed to save room configuration, please check the network
Failed to save room configuration, exception reason: %1$s\nPlease contact technical support
Room configuration update detected, attempting to go online
Task ended due to room configuration update
Please power on at the set position, the machine will check its position after going online to the dispatch server
Failed to retrieve map information, please check the machine network
Failed to retrieve map information, please join the room first
Failed to retrieve map information, map is empty
Failed to retrieve map information, undefined exception: code: %1$d, message: %2$s\nPlease contact technical support
Failed to retrieve map, exception reason: %1$s\nPlease contact technical support
No online position selected, please select the online position and push the machine to that position, then retry
Failed to go online, no online position found, please check the settings
Deviation detected from online position: %1$s m, angle deviation: %2$s°, please check machine positioning and decide whether to relocate at [%3$s]

When the default charging station is set, the dispatch system will not dynamically allocate charging stations based on their occupancy status during charging tasks. Apply this setting when using mixed models with multiple charging stations
ROS timestamp jump detected, recovering, do not move or operate the robot, please wait...
Timestamp jump recovery failed, please push the machine back to the initial position and relocate manually
Timestamp jump recovery failed, please push the machine back to the charging station and relocate manually
Timestamp jump during QR code docking, task ended
Timestamp jump while passing through door control area, task ended
Timestamp jump while taking the elevator, task ended
Relocation failed after timestamp jump, task ended
No online position found, relocation not possible
Please select an online position first
Timestamp jump during lifting, task ended
Timestamp jump during charging docking, task ended
Please confirm the machine is connected to the correct network before starting the test
Fetching test server information, please wait...
Failed to fetch MQTT test information, please check the network
Failed to fetch MQTT test information, the machine is not bound to a room. Please bind it and try again
Failed to fetch MQTT test information, undefined exception: code: %1$d, message: %2$s\nPlease contact technical support
Failed to fetch MQTT test information, unknown exception: %1$s\nPlease contact technical support
Failed to establish MQTT connection, please check the network
MQTT disconnected, please check the network
MQTT subscription failed, please contact technical support
MQTT subscription successful, network testing can now begin
Map switch detected, disconnected from the dispatch server
Testing in progress, please do not click repeatedly
LoRa module not detected. Please check if the LoRa module is properly connected before starting the task.
LoRa module disconnected. Please check if the LoRa module is properly connected before starting the task.
Please set the gateway ID before starting the task.
Invalid input: Please enter a hexadecimal string consisting of 8 characters (0-9 and a-f, case insensitive).
The robot is not bound to an elevator, unable to use the elevator. Task terminated.
No online elevator gateway found, unable to use the elevator. Task terminated.
The task includes a floor not supported by the elevator, unable to use the elevator. Task terminated.
Detected communication error between the elevator gateway and the main control board, unable to use the elevator. Task terminated.
Detected door open sensor error, unable to use the elevator. Task terminated.
Detected RFID card or floor counter sensor error, unable to use the elevator. Task terminated.
Detected an error in the current floor of the elevator car, exceeding the set range. Unable to use the elevator. Task terminated.
Failed to create task due to server internal error, unable to use the elevator. Task terminated.
The current robot has an ongoing task, unable to use the elevator. Task terminated.
Communication error between the server and the gateway, unable to use the elevator. Task terminated.
Server task assignment to gateway timed out while waiting for a response, unable to use the elevator. Task terminated.
Timed out waiting for the elevator task response, unable to use the elevator. Task terminated.
Elevator door opening timeout. Task terminated.
